Room.Name: Hofton Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Hofton Avenue, running parallel to the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: Looking to the north, you can see the massive City Walls, which protect the City of Oceancrest from any attacks or sieges by any faction outside of Oceancrest. Although there hasn't been an uprising in a long time, the city knows that when their guard is let down, some rebel force will begin an attack.
